page.title: Netspective - The Fastest Path to J2EE Applications

page.name: suite
page.caption: Suite
page.heading: Developing Java Web Applications Gets Easier
page.summary: The Netspective Enterprise Frameworks Suite (NEFS) is the fastest path to building production-ready, secure, data-driven Java web applications.

page.name: what-it-does
page.caption: What it does
page.heading: NEFS Simplifies J2EE Application Development
page.summary: If your team still finds J2EE app development to be difficult, you're probably using the wrong tools.

page.name: how-it-does-it
page.caption: How it does it
page.heading: The Secret\: Declare More, Code Less
page.summary: Leverage XML to help you get more application features and functionality completed with much less code and much higher quality.

page.name: why-you-need-it
page.caption: Why use it
page.heading: Get the Job Done with NEFS
page.summary: If your development team has already mastered all the J2EE APIs, you probably don't need our Java Frameworks. In case you live in the real world, though, you need the NEFS.

page.name: process
page.caption: Process
page.heading: NEFS Supports Your Development Process
page.summary: Since there is no room for mistakes at today's rapid development pace, our Java Frameworks will keep you on track whether you use RUP, XP/Agile, Waterfall, or CMMI.

page.name: competitors
page.caption: Competitors
page.heading: NEFS is not Just Another Framework
page.summary: The first framework to concentrate on your application's functionality and not just on grunt infrastructure issues, NEFS will truly enhance your productivity.

page.name: home-grown
page.caption: Home Grown
page.heading: Why not Create My Own Framework?
page.summary: You've got customers to delight and you don't really have time or money to spend months on creating your own frameworks that my not be reusable on your future projects.

page.name: app-server
page.caption: Built-in
page.heading: Why not Use my App Server's Framework?
page.summary: Your app server vendor wants to lock you into their solution so you don't want to end up using the lightweight frameworks that come with those tools.

page.name: open-source
page.caption: Open Source
page.heading: Why not Use Free Open Source Frameworks?
page.summary: Free open source frameworks often end up costing much more by the time your application is deployed. With us you get an affordable solution with full source code and excellent support.

page.name: features
page.caption: Features
page.heading: Features that Jump-start Development
page.summary: Stop cobbling together solutions from disparate open-source and commercial providers. Our Java Frameworks contain everything you need in one integrated Suite.

page.name: screen-shots
page.caption: Screen shots
page.heading: Your J2EE Applications will Look Great
page.summary: Stop being ashamed of your user interfaces and delight your customers with applications that look as great as they work.

page.name: architecture
page.caption: Architecture
page.heading: An Architecture you're Already Familiar with
page.summary: A standards-based, pattern-oriented architecture that follows industry best-practices assures that the NEFS will fit right into your development environment.

page.name: sparx
page.caption: Sparx
page.heading: Advanced Web User Interfaces Made Simple
page.summary: If you're tired of pages and pages of HTML and hundreds or thousands of lines of Java code just to allow your user to perform web-based data entry, you need Sparx.

page.name: simplify-struts
page.caption: Simplify Struts
page.summary: What's wrong with Struts? Absolute nothing if you like to write lots of tedious HTML and Java code.

page.name: axiom
page.caption: Axiom
page.heading: Painless SQL Data Management
page.summary: If binding your data to your J2EE application seems difficult, that's because it is difficult. Axiom makes JDBC, SQL generation, data retrieval, and reporting painless.

page.name: security
page.caption: Security
page.heading: Rock-solid Role-based Security
page.summary: Harden your applications using simple declarative resource protection tags that provide consistent, hard to crack, application security with no Java code.

page.name: console
page.caption: Console
page.heading: An Industry First\: Your Own App Console
page.summary: You're probably used to app servers having a management console. But, with NEFS your applications can have their own administration consoles for managing their components.

page.name: try
page.caption: Try
page.heading: Try Us Out for Free
page.summary: If you like what you've seen so far, grab an evaluation copy and give NEFS a spin on your own workstation. You've got nothing to lose except tedious Java code.

page.name: buy
page.caption: Buy
page.heading: NEFS is Very Affordable
page.summary: Simple license provisions, complete source code, and a very affordable price let you easily justify the cost to your boss.

page.name: overview
page.caption: Services
page.heading: We Can Get Your Projects Done
page.summary: We have been delivering information technology solutions to global Fortune 1000 corporations for years.

page.name: methodology
page.caption: Methodology
page.heading: We Use Repeatable Processes
page.summary: Since we've done dozens of projects over many years we've come up with repeatable processes that have proven highly effective.
